FORM_SECTION.HELP:
Here you can configure SuperProductivity to list uncompleted CalDav todos for a specific project in the task creation panel in the daily planning view. They will be listed as suggestions and will provide a link to the todo as well as more information about it.

In addition you can automatically add and sync all uncompleted todos to your task backlog.

To make it work for nextcloud on mobile and web, you might need to whitelist "https://app.super-productivity.com" via the nextcloud app webapppassword.
FORM_SECTION.TITLE: CalDav

FORM_SECTION.HELP:
Tu môžete nakonfigurovať program SuperProductivity tak, aby na paneli vytvárania úloh v zobrazení denného plánovania zobrazoval zoznam otvorených problémov Gitea pre konkrétny repozitár. Budú uvedené ako návrhy a budú obsahovať odkaz na problém, ako aj ďalšie informácie o ňom.

Okrem toho môžete automaticky pridať a importovať všetky otvorené problémy.

Ak chcete obísť obmedzenia používania a získať prístup, môžete zadať prístupový token.

They will be listed as suggestions and will provide a link to the issue as well as more information about it.

In addition you can automatically add and sync all open issues to your task backlog.

HELP_ARR.P1_1: Please provide a login name (can be found on your profile page) and an API token or password if you can't generate one for some reason. Please not that newer versions of Jira sometimes only work with the token.
HELP_ARR.P1_2: You also need to specify a JQL query which is used for the suggestions to add tasks from Jira. If you need help check out this link https://confluence.atlassian.com/jirasoftwarecloud/advanced-searching-764478330.html.
HELP_ARR.P1_3: You can also configure, if you want to automatically (e.g. every time you visit the planning view), to add all new tasks specified by a custom JQL query to the backlog.
HELP_ARR.P1_4: Another option is "Check if current ticket is assigned to current user". If enabled and you're starting, a check will be made if you're currently assigned to that ticket on Jira, if not an Dialog appears in which you can chose to assign the ticket to yourself.
HELP_ARR.P2_1: There are several options to determine when and how you want to submit a worklog. Enabling 'Open worklog dialog for adding a worklog to Jira when task is done' opens a dialog to add an worklog every time you mark a Jira Task as done. So keep in mind that worklogs will be added on top of everything tracked so far. So if you mark a task as done for a second time, you might not want to submit the complete worked time for the task again.
HELP_ARR.P2_2: 'Open worklog dialog when sub task is done and not for tasks with sub tasks themselves' opens a worklog dialog every time when you mark a sub task of a Jira issue as done. Because you already track your time via the sub tasks, no dialog is opened once you mark the Jira task itself as done.
HELP_ARR.P2_3: 'Send updates to worklog automatically without dialog' does what it says. Because marking a task as done several times leads to the whole worked time being tracked twice, this is not recommended.
HELP_ARR.P3_1: Here you can reconfigure your default transitions. Jira enables a wide configuration of transitions usually coming into action as different columns on your Jira agile board we can't make assumptions about where and when to transition your tasks and you need to set it manually.

EVAL_FORM.HELP_H1: Prečo by ma to malo zaujímať?
EVAL_FORM.HELP_P1: Time for a little self evaluation! Your answers here are saved and provide you with a little bit of statistics on how you work in the metrics section. Furthermore the suggestions for tomorrow will appear above your task list the next day.
EVAL_FORM.HELP_P2: This is intended to be less about calculating exact metrics or becoming machine like efficient in all you do than it is about improving how you feel about your work. It can be helpful to evaluate pain points in your daily routine, as well as it is to find factors that help you out. Being just a little bit systematic about it hopefully helps to get a better grip on these and to improve what you can.
EVAL_FORM.IMPROVEMENTS_TOMORROW: Čo by ste mohli urobiť, aby ste sa zajtra zlepšili?
EVAL_FORM.PRODUCTIVITY_HINT: 1: Ešte som ani nezačal - 10: Nesmierne efektívne

POMODORO.ENJOY_YOURSELF: Užite si to, rozhýbte sa a vráťte sa o:

NOTIFICATION.NO_TASKS: Pred spustením časovača Pomodoro musíte pridať úlohy.

S.SESSION_SKIP: Preskočiť na koniec aktuálnej relácie Pomodoro

COMP.INTRO: People with high procrastination levels usually have low self-compassion. So practice it! It improves your feeling of self-worth, fosters positive emotions and can help you overcome procrastination, of course. Try a little exercise:
COMP.L1: Sit down for bit and stretch yourself, if you like, calm down a little bit
COMP.L2: Try to listen to the thoughts and feelings that arise
COMP.L3: Are you responding to yourself in a way that you would respond to a friend?
COMP.L4: If the answer is no, imagine your friend in your situation. What you would say to them? What you would do for them?
COMP.OUTRO: More exercises can be found here or on google.
COMP.TITLE: Self Compassion

CUR.INTRO: Procrastination is interesting, isn't it? It doesn't make sense to do it. Not in your long term interest at all. But still everybody does it. Enjoy and explore!
CUR.L1: What feelings are eliciting your temptation to procrastinate?
CUR.L2: Where do you feel them in your body?
CUR.L3: What do they remind you of?
CUR.L4: What happens to the thought of procrastinating as you observe it? Does it intensify? Dissipate? Cause other emotions to arise?
CUR.L5: How are the sensations in your body shifting as you continue to rest your awareness on them?
CUR.PROCRASTINATION_TRIGGERS_TEXT: Ďalšou veľmi účinnou metódou je zaznamenávať si, čo vo vás vyvolalo nutkanie odkladať. Napríklad ja osobne mám často nutkanie rýchlo skočiť na reddit alebo na obľúbenú spravodajskú stránku, kedykoľvek sa okno môjho prehliadača zaostrí. Odkedy som si začal zapisovať svoje spúšťače do obyčajného prázdneho textového dokumentu, uvedomil som si, ako veľmi je tento vzorec zakorenený, a pomohlo mi to experimentovať s rôznymi protiopatreniami.
CUR.TITLE: Curiosity

INTRO.STRESSED: Stres z toho, že sa vám nedarí robiť veci
INTRO.TITLE: Úvod

PROCRASTINATION.P1: First of all relax! Everybody does it once in a while. And if you're not doing what you should, you should at least enjoy it! Then check out the sections below for something helpful.
PROCRASTINATION.P2: Remember: Procrastination is an emotion regulation problem, not a time management problem.

REFRAME.INTRO: Think about what might be positive about the task despite its flaws.
REFRAME.TITLE: Reframing
REFRAME.TL1: What might be interesting about it?
REFRAME.TL2: What is to gain if you complete it?
REFRAME.TL3: How will you feel about it if you complete it?

SPLIT_UP.INTRO: Split up the task into as many small chunks as you can.
SPLIT_UP.OUTRO: Done? Then think about it. What would be – strictly theoretical – the first thing you would do if you were to start working on the task? Just think about it...
SPLIT_UP.TITLE: Split it up!

D_INITIAL.TEXT:
The idea of the Schedule is to provide a better picture of how one's planned tasks play out over time. It is automatically generated from your Tasks and distinguishes two different things: Scheduled Tasks, which are shown at their planned time and Regular Tasks which should flow around those fixed events. All tasks consider the time estimates you have assigned to them.

In addition to this you can also provide a work start and end time. If configured regular tasks will never show up outside of these. Please note that the schedule only includes the upcoming 30 days.
D_INITIAL.TITLE: Časová os

SCHEDULE.NO_TASKS: V súčasnosti nie sú k dispozícii žiadne úlohy. Prosím, pridajte nejaké úlohy pomocou tlačidla + v hornej lište.

FORM.HELP: Here you can configure simple buttons which will appear at the top right. They can either be timers or just a simple counter, which is counted up, by clicking on it.
FORM.TITLE: Jednoduché počítadlá

A.ARCHIVE_ONLY_UPLOADED: Vaše údaje boli nahrané len čiastočne. Skúste to prosím neskôr! V opačnom prípade nebudete môcť synchronizovať svoje údaje s inými zariadeniami.
A.POSSIBLE_LEGACY_DATA: Aplikácia Super Productivity zlepšila synchronizáciu tým, že teraz používa dva samostatné súbory namiesto jedného, čo umožňuje oveľa menší prenos údajov. Odporúča sa aktualizovať všetky inštancie aplikácie Super Productivity a najprv synchronizovať údaje z inštancie aplikácie, v ktorej sú údaje najnovšie. Ak ide o údaje z vášho miestneho zariadenia, potom toto upozornenie ignorujte a pokračujte v ich odosielaní potvrdením ďalšieho dialógového okna.

C.EMPTY_SYNC: Snažíte sa synchronizovať prázdny dátový objekt. Ak sa pokúšate nastaviť synchronizáciu z novej inštancie aplikácie, stačí stlačiť tlačidlo OK, aby ste načítali údaje zo servera. V opačnom prípade skontrolujte svoje údaje.
C.FORCE_UPLOAD_AFTER_ERROR: Pri nahrávaní miestnych údajov došlo k chybe. Chcete vynútiť aktualizáciu?
C.MIGRATE_LEGACY: Pri importe boli zistené staršie údaje, chcete sa pokúsiť o ich migráciu?
C.NO_REMOTE_DATA: Nenašli sa žiadne vzdialené údaje. Nahrať lokálne údaje na vzdialené?
C.TRY_LOAD_REMOTE_AGAIN: Skúsiť znova načítať údaje zo vzdialeného zariadenia?
C.UNABLE_TO_LOAD_REMOTE_DATA: Nie je možné načítať údaje zo vzdialeného zariadenia. Chcete sa pokúsiť prepísať vzdialené údaje svojimi miestnymi údajmi? Všetky vzdialené údaje sa pri tom stratia.

D_AUTH_CODE.FOLLOW_LINK: Otvorte nasledujúci odkaz a skopírujte poskytnutý autorizačný kód do vstupného poľa nižšie.
D_AUTH_CODE.TITLE: Login: {{provider}}

D_CONFLICT.TEXT: Aktualizácia na diaľku. Zdá sa, že lokálne aj vzdialené údaje sa zmenili.
D_CONFLICT.TITLE: Synchronizácia: Konfliktné údaje

D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T2: Vaše archívne údaje neboli počas poslednej synchronizácie správne nahrané:
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T4: 1. Prejdite do druhého zariadenia a dokončite synchronizáciu tam.
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T5:
2. Alebo môžete vzdialené údaje prepísať svojimi miestnymi údajmi. Všetky vzdialené zmeny sa
    stratia!
D_INCOMPLETE_SYNC.T6: Odporúča sa vytvoriť zálohu prepísaných údajov!!!

D_PERMISSION.TEXT: Vaše povolenie na synchronizáciu súborov bolo zrušené.
D_PERMISSION.TITLE: Synchronizácia: Odmietnutie oprávnenia na lokálny súbor

FORM.L_ENABLE_ENCRYPTION: Povolenie koncového šifrovania (experimentálne) - znemožnite poskytovateľovi synchronizácie prístup k vašim údajom
FORM.L_ENCRYPTION_NOTES: DÔLEŽITÉ POZNÁMKY: Aby všetko fungovalo, je potrebné nastaviť rovnaké heslo aj na ostatných zariadeniach PRED ďalšou synchronizáciou. Vyberte si bezpečné heslo. Upozorňujeme tiež, že ak toto heslo zabudnete, nebudete mať prístup k svojim údajom. Nie je možná žiadna obnova. , pretože kľúč máte len vy. Šifrovanie bude pravdepodobne dostatočne dobré na to, aby zmarilo väčšinu útočníkov, ale neexistuje žiadna záruka.

LOCAL_FILE.L_SYNC_FILE_PATH_PERMISSION_VALIDATION: Potrebuje oprávnenie na prístup k súboru

FORM.TITLE: Synchronizácia

WEB_DAV.CORS_INFO: Making it work on MOBILE and in the browser: To make this work for mobile or the browser you need to whitelist Super Productivity for CORS requests for your Nextcloud instance. This can have negative security implications! Please refer to this thread for more information. One approach to make this work on mobile is whitelisting "https://app.super-productivity.com" via the nextcloud app webapppassword. Use at your own risk!

S.ALREADY_IN_SYNC_NO_LOCAL_CHANGES: Žiadne miestne zmeny - Už je synchronizované
S.ERROR_FALLBACK_TO_BACKUP: Pri importe údajov sa niečo pokazilo. Návrat k lokálnej zálohe.
S.ERROR_NO_REV: Žiadny platný rev pre vzdialený súbor
S.ERROR_UNABLE_TO_READ_REMOTE_DATA: Chyba pri synchronizácii. Nie je možné načítať vzdialené údaje. Možno ste povolili šifrovanie a vaše miestne heslo sa nezhoduje s heslom použitým na šifrovanie vzdialených údajov?
S.INCOMPLETE_CFG: Overenie pre synchronizáciu zlyhalo. Prosím, skontrolujte svoju konfiguráciu!
S.UPLOAD_ERROR: Neznáma chyba pri nahrávaní (sú nastavenia správne?): {{err}}

D_CONFIRM_MOVE_TO_PROJECT.MSG: There are {{tasksNr}} instances created for this repeatable task. Do you want to move all of them to the project "{{projectName}}"?

D_CONFIRM_REMOVE.MSG: Removing the repeat config will convert all previous instances of this task to just regular tasks. Are you sure you want to proceed

D_CONFIRM_UPDATE_INSTANCES.MSG: There are {{tasksNr}} instances created for this repeatable task. Do you want to update all of them with the new defaults or just future tasks?

D_EDIT.HELP1: Repeating tasks are meant for daily chores, e.g.: "Organization", "Daily Meeting", "Code Review", "Checking emails" or similar tasks which are likely to occur again and again.
D_EDIT.HELP2: Once configured a repeating task will be recreated on every day selected below as soon as you open your project and will be automatically marked as completed at the end of the day. They will be handled as different instances. So you can freely add sub tasks etc.
D_EDIT.HELP3: Tasks imported from Jira or Git Issues cannot be repeated.
D_EDIT.HELP4: A note about the order field: Referring to the creation order repeatable tasks. Only in effect for repeatable tasks that are created at the same time. A lower value means a task will be higher up the list, a higher number that it will be further down. A value greater than 0 means items are created at the bottom of normal tasks.

F.ORDER_DESCRIPTION: Creation order of repeatable tasks. Only affects repeatable tasks created at the same time. A lower value means a task will be created higher up the list, a higher number that it will be further down. A value greater than 0 means items are created at the bottom of normal tasks.
F.START_TIME_DESCRIPTION: Napr. 15:00. Pri celodennej úlohe ponechajte prázdne
F.TITLE: Názov pre úlohu

D_IDLE.SIMPLE_COUNTER_CONFIRM_TXT: You selected skip, but activated {{nr}} simple counter button(s). Do you want to track the idle time to them?
D_IDLE.SPLIT_TIME: Split time into multiples tasks and breaks

WORKLOG.D_CONFIRM_RESTORE: Are you sure you want to move the task "{{title}}" into your todays task list?

FILE_IMEX.PRIVACY_EXPORT: Export anonymized data (to send to contact@super-productivity.com for debugging)

G.DURATION_DESCRIPTION: e.g. "5h 6m" which results in 5 hours in 6 minutes

G.TRACKING_INTERVAL_DESCRIPTION: Sledovanie času pomocou tohto intervalu v milisekundách. Možno ho budete chcieť zmeniť, aby ste znížili počet zápisov na disk. Pozri problém č. 2355.

AUTO_BACKUPS.HELP: Auto save all data to your app folder in order to have it ready in case something goes wrong.

CALENDARS.BROWSER_WARNING:
Vzhľadom na obmedzenia týkajúce sa rôznych pôvodov to pravdepodobne nebude fungovať s verziou prehliadača Super Productivity.
Ak chcete túto funkciu používať, stiahnite si prosím verziu pre počítače !
CALENDARS.DEFAULT_PROJECT: Predvolený projekt pre pridané úlohy kalendára
CALENDARS.HELP: V aplikácii Super Productivity môžete integrovať kalendáre, ktoré vám budú pripomínať a pridávať ich ako úlohy. Integrácia funguje pomocou formátu iCal. Aby to fungovalo, musia byť vaše kalendáre prístupné buď cez internet, alebo prostredníctvom súborového systému.
CALENDARS.SHOW_BANNER_THRESHOLD: Zobraziť upozornenie X pred udalosťou (prázdne pre vypnuté)

EVALUATION.IS_HIDE_EVALUATION_SHEET: Hide evaluation sheet on daily summary
EVALUATION.TITLE: Evaluation & Metrics

FOCUS_MODE.HELP: Režim sústredenia otvorí obrazovku bez rozptyľovania, aby vám pomohol sústrediť sa na aktuálnu úlohu.
FOCUS_MODE.L_ALWAYS_OPEN_FOCUS_MODE: Vždy otvorený režim zaostrovania pri sledovaní
FOCUS_MODE.TITLE: Režim zaostrenia

IDLE.HELP: When idle time handling is enabled a dialog will open after a specified amount of time to check if and on which task you want to track your time, when you have been idle.
IDLE.IS_ONLY_OPEN_IDLE_WHEN_CURRENT_TASK: Only trigger idle time dialog when a current task is selected
IDLE.TITLE: Idle Handling

IMEX.HELP:
Here you can export all your data as a JSON for backups, but also to use it in a different context (e.g. you might want to export your projects in the browser and import them into the desktop version).

The import expects valid JSON to be copied into the text area. NOTE: Once you hit the import button all your current settings and data will be overwritten!
IMEX.TITLE: Import/Export

KEYBOARD.GLOBAL_TOGGLE_TASK_START: Prepnúť sledovanie času pre poslednú aktívnu úlohu
KEYBOARD.HELP:
Here you can configure all keyboard shortcuts.

Click on the text input and enter the desired keyboard combination. Hit enter to save and Escape to abort.

There are three types of shortcuts:

  • Global shortcuts: When the app is running it will trigger the action from every other application.
  • Application level shortcuts: Will trigger from every screen of the application, but not if you're currently editing a text field.
  • Task level shortcuts: They will only trigger if you have selected a task via mouse or keyboard and usually trigger an action specifically related to that one task.

You can press Escape to remove a shortcut.
KEYBOARD.MOVE_TO_BACKLOG: Presunutie úlohy do zoznamu nevybavených úloh
KEYBOARD.MOVE_TO_TODAYS_TASKS: Move Task to Today"s Task List
KEYBOARD.TASK_MOVE_TO_PROJECT: Otvoriť ponuku presunúť úlohu do projektu
KEYBOARD.TASK_SHORTCUTS_INFO: Nasledujúce skratky sa vzťahujú na aktuálne vybranú úlohu (vybranú pomocou karty alebo myši).
KEYBOARD.TITLE: Klávesové skratky

MISC.DEFAULT_PROJECT: Predvolený projekt, ktorý sa použije pre úlohy, ak nie je zadaný žiadny
MISC.HELP: Not seeing Desktop Notifications? For windows you might want to check System > Notifications & actions and check if the required notifications have been enabled.
MISC.IS_AUTO_ADD_WORKED_ON_TO_TODAY: Automatically add today tag to worked on tasks
MISC.IS_AUTO_MARK_PARENT_AS_DONE: Mark parent task as done, when all sub tasks are done
MISC.IS_CONFIRM_BEFORE_EXIT_WITHOUT_FINISH_DA: Confirm before exiting the app without finishing day first
MISC.IS_HIDE_NAV: Hide navigation until main header is hovered (desktop only)
MISC.IS_TRAY_SHOW_CURRENT_TASK: Show current task in the tray / status menu (desktop mac/windows only)
MISC.IS_TURN_OFF_MARKDOWN: Turn off markdown parsing for task notes
MISC.IS_USE_MINIMAL_SIDE_NAV: Používajte minimálny navigačný panel (zobrazujte len ikony)
MISC.START_OF_NEXT_DAY_HINT: od kedy (v hodinách) chcete počítať, že začal ďalší deň. predvolená hodnota je polnoc, čo je 0.
MISC.TITLE: Rôzne nastavenia

POMODORO.CYCLES_BEFORE_LONGER_BREAK: Začnite dlhšiu prestávku po X pracovných stretnutiach
POMODORO.HELP:
The pomodoro timer can be configured via a couple of settings. The duration of every work session, the duration of normal breaks, the number of work sessions to run before a longer break is started and the duration of this longer break.

You can also set if you want to display your distractions during your pomodoro breaks.

Setting "Pause time tracking on pomodoro break" will also track your breaks as work time spent on a task.

Enabling "Pause pomodoro session when no active task" will also pause the pomodoro session, when you pause a task.
POMODORO.IS_MANUAL_CONTINUE: Manuálne potvrdiť spustenie ďalšej relácie pomodoro
POMODORO.IS_STOP_TRACKING_ON_BREAK: Stop time tracking for task on break
POMODORO.TITLE: Časovač Pomodoro

REMINDER.TITLE: Pripomienky

SCHEDULE.HELP: The schedule feature should provide you with a quick overview over how your planned tasks play out over time. You can find it in the left hand menu under 'Schedule'.
SCHEDULE.L_IS_WORK_START_END_ENABLED: Limit unscheduled task flow to specific work times

SHORT_SYNTAX.HELP: Tu môžete ovládať krátke možnosti syntaxe pri vytváraní úlohy

SOUND.IS_INCREASE_DONE_PITCH: Zvýšiť výšku tónu za každú vykonanú úlohu

TAKE_A_BREAK.FULL_SCREEN_BLOCKER_DURATION: Trvanie zobrazenia okna na celú obrazovku (len na ploche)
TAKE_A_BREAK.HELP:
Allows you to configure a reoccurring reminder when you have worked for a specified amount of time without taking a break.

You can modify the message displayed. ${duration} will be replaced with the time spent without a break.
TAKE_A_BREAK.IS_FOCUS_WINDOW: Focus app window when reminder is active (desktop only)
TAKE_A_BREAK.IS_FULL_SCREEN_BLOCKER: Zobrazenie správy v okne na celú obrazovku (len na ploche)
TAKE_A_BREAK.IS_LOCK_SCREEN: Lock screen when a break is due (desktop only)
TAKE_A_BREAK.MIN_WORKING_TIME: Trigger take a break notification after X working without one
TAKE_A_BREAK.SNOOZE_TIME: Snooze time when prompted to take a break
TAKE_A_BREAK.TITLE: Break Reminder

TIME_TRACKING.HELP: Pripomienka sledovania času je banner, ktorý sa zobrazí v prípade, že ste zabudli spustiť sledovanie času.
TIME_TRACKING.L_DEFAULT_ESTIMATE: Predvolený odhad času pre nové úlohy
TIME_TRACKING.L_DEFAULT_ESTIMATE_SUB_TASKS: Predvolený odhad času pre nové čiastkové úlohy
TIME_TRACKING.L_IS_AUTO_START_NEXT_TASK: Spustenie sledovania ďalšej úlohy po označení aktuálnej ako hotovej
TIME_TRACKING.L_IS_TRACKING_REMINDER_SHOW_ON_MOBILE: Zobrazenie pripomenutia sledovania v mobilnej aplikácii
TIME_TRACKING.L_TRACKING_REMINDER_MIN_TIME: Čas čakania pred zobrazením upozornenia na sledovanie Banner
TIME_TRACKING.TITLE: Sledovanie času

SCHEDULE.NO_REPEATABLE_TASKS: There are currently no repeated tasks. You can schedule a task by choosing "Repeat Task" in the task side panel. To open it click on the most right icon that appears when hovering a task (or just tap on the task on mobile).
SCHEDULE.NO_SCHEDULED: There are currently no scheduled tasks. You can schedule a task by choosing "Schedule Task" in the task context menu. To open it right click (long press on mobile) on a task.
